-- | A highlight middleware
--   
--   It uses highlighting-kate to highlight any code inside pre / code with
--   a class attribute hinting the language. It's a proper middleware that
--   works on any html document.
@package bamboo-plugin-highlight
@version 2009.7.5

module Bamboo.Plugin.Highlight
highlight :: Middleware
